title: Regarding Yorick's VU and his Pentakill splash art
body:
We all know that Yorick is one of the next champions to be getting their huge rework (Sion/Poppy/Taric style), and all of their new splashes have been getting updated. 

Regarding his Pentakill skin! When he gets his rework/VU, will the Pentakill splash be updated to something completely new, or will it be the same? How do these VUs affect shared splash arts?

replies.body:
As far as I remember Reav3 talked about the fact that when Yorick's splashes are updated they'll modify the _current_ Pentakill splash art to match with any changes made to Yorick in the VGU process, but won't give that skin a completely new splash art.

I think that's what's up.

Sounds great :D May I ask, if AND when Mordekaiser gets his VGU, will he be getting himeslf updated in that Pentakill splash art as well, similar to Yorick?

Just need my daily Shadow Isles news :D

yup, and in the High Stakes splash art as well

He looks so perfect in that splash though ;-; 

That makes me wonder... what if he doesn't receive that massive of a VU, but more like what Shen got? I think  that he would mainly be getting a model update, because his splashes look fine.
I mean it's hard to say anything is 100% certain for the future, but most likely.
Well I would say even that level of work would be a pretty significant update to his look. Hell, as long as they get rid of pizza feet I'd be content.

As far as i know Yorick is a full relaunch.
You can expect everything to change like splasharts, to his lore, visuals, personality, voice, gameplay etc.

Well he does look pretty nice in the Pentakill splash, but we don't know in what direction will go with Yorick.
Poppy went from angry looking yordle paladin to cute hero that wields a mysterious hammer.
Sion went from funny undead mage guy to crazed undead killing machine with not memory of his past.
Taric went from gem knight with earth powers to exiled soldier that went to Mt. Targon to become a protector of all life and beauty.
Yorick will probably be turned into Dwayne The Rock Johnson with a shovel from Ikea and his ghouls will be living pepperoni plants.
Seriously though, i hope they keep Yorick similiar in a way like Poppy. At least the body form, it just fits Yorick too well.
All upcoming Champion VU will get new splash arts (newer ones excluded for obvious reasons)
